actions.committee: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 with respect to subsidy fees.
short_title: Small Business Venture Capital Act of 2001

summary.text: Small Business Venture Capital Act of 2001 - Amends the Small Business Investment Act of 1985 to increase the cost recovery fee charged by the Small Business Administration for guaranteeing small business investment company debentures. Extends the program to debentures obligated after FY 2001 (currently, FY 2000).

titles.title: Small Business Venture Capital Act of 2001
A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 with respect to subsidy fees.
